tests.assumption: Customers will pay 15-20% premium for flexible ordering
Digital platform adoption will be high among target customers
tests.test: platform demo and usability testing with 10 customers
tests.metric: ≥80% complete demo successfully and express interest
tests.validation_method: user experience testing and feedback collection

tests.assumption: Working capital financing demand exists in target market
tests.test: financial services survey with 15 potential customers
tests.metric: ≥60% express interest in inventory financing options
tests.validation_method: customer interviews focused on cash flow challenges

tests.assumption: Suppliers will provide flexible terms for smaller distributors
tests.metric: ≥3 suppliers agree to flexible payment and volume terms
tests.validation_method: direct supplier negotiations and term sheets

tests.assumption: 48-hour delivery is achievable across Caribbean region
tests.metric: ≥90% of test shipments delivered within 48 hours
tests.validation_method: pilot shipment tracking and performance measurement

tests.assumption: Customer acquisition cost will be ≤$1,200 per customer
tests.validation_method: digital marketing campaign with conversion tracking

tests.assumption: Inventory turnover of 12-15x annually is achievable
tests.test: demand forecasting model with historical data
tests.validation_method: data analysis and forecasting model validation

tests.assumption: Financial services will generate 10% of total revenue
tests.metric: ≥3 customers utilize financing services within 30 days
tests.validation_method: pilot program with actual financial service offerings

tests.assumption: Regional expansion to 5+ markets is viable by Year 2
tests.test: market entry analysis for Trinidad and Jamaica
tests.metric: Identify viable entry strategy with <$50K setup cost per market

tests.assumption: Customer retention rate will exceed 85% annually
tests.test: customer satisfaction survey and retention analysis
tests.metric: ≥90% customer satisfaction score and retention intent
tests.validation_method: customer satisfaction surveys and retention interviews
